name: Fall Guys but I only had 1 hour
name_original: Fall Guys but I only had 1 hour
description:
• Next 1 hour game (TBA)
  • Previous 1 hour game
  • More games

This is Fall Guys, but without the multiplayer or 3D or skins or juicy effects or moving objects, because I only had 1 hour to make it. The real Fall guys is actually not a simple game, it took tons of work hours to make, so please play it! The game has 3 levels. Share screenshots of when you reach first place! Game Maker Studio 2 source code is also available if you want to make Fall Guys yourself.

Controls:

  • WASD/arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar: jump
  • R: restart game

Why I made this ^
